errors.failedPrecondition: The required conditions are not met.
errors.notFound: The requested document does not exist.
errors.permissionDenied: You do not have the rights to perform this action.
errors.readOnlyDocument: This document cannot be modified or deleted.
errors.resourceExhausted: Quota exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.unauthenticated: You must be logged in to perform this action.
errors.unavailable: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again.
errors.unimplemented: This feature is not yet available.
